pt.ulisboa.tecnico.cnv.scaling

Class ScalingInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ulisboa.tecnico.cnv.scaling.ScalingInstance

  • public class ScalingInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of an AWS Instance, its State and current estimated Cost.

    • Method Detail

      • addCost

        public void addCost(double cost)
        Adds the estimated Cost of the Request that will be forwarded to this WebServer Instance to its current associated Cost.
        Parameters:
        cost - Incoming Request estimated Cost.

      • getCurrentCost

        public double getCurrentCost()
        Gets the current estimated Cost associated with this Instance.
        Returns:
        Instance current estimated Cost.

      • getInstanceId

        public java.lang.String getInstanceId()
        Gets the Id of this Instance.
        Returns:
        Instance Id.

      • getPublicDnsName

        public java.lang.String getPublicDnsName()
        Gets the Public DNS Name for this Instance.
        Returns:
        Instance Public DNS Name.

      • isHealthy

        public boolean isHealthy()
        Checks whether the Instance is Healthy. The Instance is Healthy when it has already been initialized and the number of unsuccessful Health Checks is 0.
        Returns:
        True if the Instance is Healthy, otherwise, False.

      • isUnhealthy

        public boolean isUnhealthy()
        Checks whether the Instance is Unhealthy. The Instance is Unhealthy when the number of unsuccessful Health Checks is greater than or equal to the UnhealthyThreshold.
        Returns:
        True if the Instance is Unhealthy, otherwise, False.

      • registerHealthyCheck

        public void registerHealthyCheck()
        Records a successful Health Check. If the Instance is already Healthy, it returns. Otherwise, it will set the Instance to be initialized and increase the number of successful Health Checks, that when equal to or greater than the HealthyThreshold, the Instance is defined as Healthy.

      • registerUnhealthyCheck

        public void registerUnhealthyCheck()
        Records an unsuccessful Health Check. If the Instance has not yet been initialized, it returns. Otherwise, it will increase the number of unsuccessful Health Checks and redefine the number of successful ones.

      • removeCost

        public void removeCost(double cost)
        Removes the estimated Cost of the Request that this WebServer Instance has finalized from its associated current Cost.
        Parameters:
        cost - Incoming Request estimated Cost.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Gets the State of this Instance at the current time.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Instance State.
